WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I'm new to MVC (using MVC3).
I'm not able to write code for a drop down list using DropDownListFor.
My requirement is:
I've a list of branches of type Branch.
Branch class is with properties: int ID, string Name, string Parent (ideally Parent should be of type Branch again. But avoided here to reduce complexity).
 
Now I want a drop down list box with list of Branch names.
 
I'm not able to find suitable example.
 
Please help me provide code for my requirement!
 
Thanks,
Suresh.
